    • login

      @PostMapping("/secondLogin") public String login(@ModelAttribute("employee") Employee employee, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Processes the second login form submission. Validates the employee's credentials and redirects to the clock-in/out page.
      Parameters:
      employee - the employee object submitted from the form
      model - the model object for rendering the view
      Returns:
      the URL for redirecting to the clock-in/out page

    • clockInOut

      @GetMapping("/clock-in-out") public String clockInOut(@RequestParam("employeeId") Long employeeId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the clock-in/out page for the specified employee. Determines the clock-in/out status and calculates the hours passed.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - the ID of the employee
      model - the model object for rendering the view
      Returns:
      the name of the employee/clock-in-out view

    • clockIn

      @GetMapping("/clock-in") public String clockIn(@RequestParam("employeeId") Long employeeId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Processes the clock-in request for the specified employee. Records the clock-in time in the attendance repository.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - the ID of the employee
      model - the model object for rendering the view
      Returns:
      the URL for redirecting to the attendance page

    • clockOut

      @GetMapping("/clock-out") public String clockOut(@RequestParam("employeeId") Long employeeId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Processes the clock-out request for the specified employee. Records the clock-out time in the attendance repository.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - the ID of the employee
      model - the model object for rendering the view
      Returns:
      the URL for redirecting to the attendance page

      model - the model object for rendering the view
